[----------------------Check out our full list of **customizable** and **instant setup** dedicated server packages by clicking here----------------------

DataWagon is now offering **instant setup** dedicated servers! Our instant servers are automatically provisioned in and ready to go in as little as 15 minutes from the time of payment, no matter what time of day. Instant setup configurations are available in our new Chicago location, as well as our New York data center. Check out our offers below!
  
**Why Choose DataWagon?**
* We are not a reseller, we own all of our servers and networking equipment!
* We have our own IP space and ASN from ARIN (AS27176)
* 80Gbps redundant network
* 2 Locations - Buffalo, NY & Chicago, IL
* In-house DDoS Mitigation platform

Website: https://datawagon.com
<hr>

**★★★★★★★★Instant Setup Dedicated Servers★★★★★★★★**

**Included with all servers:**
- 50TB Bandwidth on 1Gbps dedicated port
- /30 IPv4 (1 Usable IPv4 address)
- /64 IPv6
- DDoS Protection
- IPMI Access*
- BGP Sessions
- 15 Minute Setup!

<hr>
